chapters.name: Chapter 1
chapters.description: Introduction to ChatGPT: Understanding its purpose, history, use cases, and basic functioning.
chapters.content: ChatGPT is a conversational AI model developed by OpenAI. It evolves through multiple versions (GPT-1 to GPT-4), offering various capabilities like text generation, programming assistance, and educational help. ChatGPT operates by predicting the next word in a context, enabling natural conversations.

test.question: Which version of GPT introduced multimodal capabilities?

chapters.name: Chapter 2
chapters.description: Mastering Prompt Writing: Learn how to craft precise and effective prompts for ChatGPT.
chapters.content: Effective prompts are structured clearly with explicit instructions and context. Examples include defining the task clearly, adding specific details, and using constraints like word limits.

test.question: What is a key element of an effective prompt?

chapters.name: Chapter 3
chapters.description: Exploring Advanced Features: Unlock the full potential of ChatGPT by utilizing advanced tools and integrations.
chapters.content: ChatGPT supports advanced features like code execution (Python), image generation (DALL-E), and web browsing. These tools enhance its usability for complex tasks like data analysis, creative designs, and real-time information retrieval.

test.question: Which advanced feature allows code execution?

chapters.name: Chapter 4
chapters.description: Applications in Specific Domains: Learn how ChatGPT is applied in writing, programming, education, and customer support.
chapters.content: ChatGPT excels in diverse domains such as content creation (articles, blogs), education (simplified explanations, tutoring), programming (debugging, code generation), and customer service (automated responses).

test.question: Which domain is NOT a common application of ChatGPT?

chapters.name: Chapter 5
chapters.description: Best Practices and Limitations: Understand how to use ChatGPT responsibly while acknowledging its limitations.
chapters.content: Use ChatGPT responsibly by verifying critical information and avoiding unethical applications. It has limitations, such as potential biases and outdated knowledge, and cannot access real-time data without external tools.

test.question: What is one limitation of ChatGPT?
